title: Charles M. Blow, "The Devil You Know: A Black Power Manifesto"
description:
New York Times op-ed columnist Charles M. Blow makes his case for Blacks to amass political power and combat white supremacy. He’s interviewed by author and Woodson Center founder and president Robert Woodson.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
